parameter.name: config_1_2
parameter.label: 1: W meter report period
parameter.description: If the setting is configured for 1 hour (value = 720), the device will report its instant power consumption every 1 hour to Z-Wave Controller. Unit: 5 seconds

parameter.name: config_2_2
parameter.label: 2: kWh meter report period
parameter.description: If the setting is configured for 1 hour (value = 6), the device will report its total power consumption every 1 hour to Z-Wave Controller. Unit: 10 minutes

parameter.name: config_3_1
parameter.label: 3: Selected endpoint
parameter.description: If Controller not using Multi_Channel command class to access the endpoint of PAN04, you may configure the endpoint value to react the Basic Command Class

parameter.name: config_5_2
parameter.label: 5: Threshold of Watt for Load Caution
parameter.description: If threshold of wattage is reached, a meter report will be generated

parameter.name: config_6_2
parameter.label: 6: Threshold of kWh for Load Caution
parameter.description: If threshold of kWh is reached, a Meter Report will be generated

parameter.name: config_7_1
parameter.label: 7: Restore switch state mode
parameter.description: Restores the switch state setting in case the device was disconnected from the power source.

parameter.name: config_8_2
parameter.label: 8: Auto Off Timer
parameter.description: Whenever the device switches to on, the auto off timer begin to count down. After the timer decrease to zero, it will switch off automatically.

parameter.name: config_9_1
parameter.label: 9: RF off command mode
parameter.description: Whenever a switch off command, BASIC_SET 、BINARY_SWITCH_SET 、 SWITCH_ALL_OFF, is received, it could be interpreted as 4 kinds of commands.

parameter.name: config_10_1
parameter.label: 10: Endpoint 3
parameter.description: Multi-Channel Command is a good way to control relay1 and relay2 of PAN04 individually. The endpoint3 of PAN04 is related to both relay1 and relay2. In some condition it becomes redundant in Multi-Channel Command Class.

parameter.name: wakeup_interval
parameter.label: Wakeup Period
parameter.description: Set the wakeup period in seconds

parameter.name: wakeup_node
parameter.label: Wakeup Node
parameter.description: The node to which wakeup messages will be sent
